synopsis:
"You're my fianc√©, so it's only natural that we do this tonight." He kisses me deeply and devoures my whole body... My first sweet kiss on my first night of reincarnation.

Office worker dies from overworking and gets reincarnated as the villain in her favorite otome game. Will she be able to keep her fiance or will she lose him to the protagonist?

(Source: Coolmic)

title.en: Game World Reincarnation ~Sex on the First Night~
title.jp: Ouji no Honmei wa Akuyaku Reijou
